Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:



~This sucks~ Choran said via inner monologue comm.


~I know~ Predator said in the same fashion.

~What will they do?  And what the slag are these Maximals' problems?  Do you 
go bannannas if you stay here too long?~

~Quiet.  I can't think with all this inner monologue jabbering.  The 
Maximals, if they are just and haven't been corrupted, will put us on trial~

~A fixed trial~ Predator retorted.

~Most likely, that is true Predator.  If it's a jury, the decision will be 
made~

~Execution?~ Choran asked.

~No, stasis until the war ends most likely, where we will be tried and most 
likely be convicted as war criminals on Cybertron by those corrupt Maximal 
Elders~

Silence filled both the cells, and the minds of all three bounty hunters.
